page.title: 14NEWS STORIES 1985.
page.content:
SPORT
Mandy Taylor is planing two dressage events.One on February 21st 1985 and the other on March 2nd 1985 with Jennie Loriston Clarke.22 year old Mandy hopes to make Â£1,400 on addmisson fees.To stage the dressage competition Mandy has enlisted Lord and Lady Hugh Russel who loaned their indoor arena.
POLITICAL
The leftwing dominated Newham Borough Council is believed to have prepared Â£250,000 or more for his resignation following a series of disagreements.The council decided in secret to offer "generous terms,"to Mr.James Pailing,46,but he is resisting all atempts to remove him.
